name: Transformation Scroll (Gargoyle)
description: Use it to transform into Gargoyle for a while. Attention! The effect will vanish when mounted or dead. This item can’t be canceled once unsealed.

description: Use it to transform into Garm for a while. Attention! The effect will vanish when mounted or dead. This item can’t be canceled once unsealed.

name: Transformation Scroll (Geographer)
description: Use to transform into an Geographer for a while. Attention! Transformation expired upon death or mounting This item cannot be canceled after opened.
